column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Visited Chicago for a week and decided to try as many deep dishes as possible.  Without naming our other choice destinations
column2: Lou was the best in our opinion.  The crust was just somehow different and stayed crunchy despite the heavy toppings.  The flavor was also better.  Yes
column3: the wait was long but can't rush deep dish.  Did I mention place was packed at 2:30pm?
